Body:
mbd = MockBlueDot()
assert mbd.color == 'blue'
assert mbd.border == False
assert mbd.square == False
assert mbd.visible == True
mbd.color = 'red'
mbd.border = True
mbd.square = True
mbd.visible = False
assert mbd.color == 'red'
assert mbd.border == True
assert mbd.square == True
assert mbd.visible == False
